TopicTitle: KerbalCon 2013 might be in an actual building

Articles.Content: The survey is pointing to the fact that KerbalCon 2013 might be hosted in an expo center or something like that. What are your thoughts? I would drive their if I could.

I honestly think it's WAY too early to set up a convention when the game isn't even in early beta yet. If anything, it should be after beta and after things get polished and the game is complete. It's just too early to do something that big right now.
Wasnt there already a kerbalcon this year?
if there was such a thing where and when would it be?

Wasnt there already a kerbalcon this year?

Yeah but I thought it was some kind of online-only thing...thus the thread.
Since I know there's no way it's going to make it to Denmark, I hope there will be an option to watch the important stuff via stream.

I hope they have something like that and I would drive their if it was within 500 miles but I don't want them to spend their whole budget planning for 30K people when they only get 2K so if its in person I hope its a small event with a 48hr stream on ksptv would be on at around the same time.

Given that the fanbase is so spread out, it'd be pretty hard to do.

Unless it was on Duna, then we could all go.

Actually, that could be a workable kind of multiplayer, where you all land in a certain spot, enter an area, then it becomes like an MMORPG.
